text:
Bishan Active Park is a lively and family-friendly recreational space located in Bishan. With a variety of amenities like modern playgrounds, basketball courts, and spacious pavilions, it’s a great spot for both children and adults. The play structures are innovative and engaging, making it an exciting destination for kids to climb, explore, and have fun.

The park also features covered seating areas and open green spaces, ideal for community events or casual gatherings. The surrounding greenery and vibrant atmosphere encourage outdoor activities and promote a healthy, active lifestyle. Whether you’re looking to exercise, relax, or spend quality time with loved ones, Bishan Active Park has something for everyone!

Many exercise facilities available from jogging tracks to football fields. Not suitable to play basketball at the court there during for a few days bef or aft an event is held there as they set up temporary shelters which the pillars and roof sometimes hard to shoot
Nice place to relax and have sports facilities. Could spend a family day out or go for a workout.

Bishan Active Park is a mini alternative to the huge Bishan Ang Mo Kio Park. It serves mainly the residents in Street 23 and 24.

This is often used to hold the National Day dinners and many other resident friendly events oganised by the community centre.

This park offers elderly friendly exercise corner. kids playground, fitness corner, soccer field, basketball court and even a beach volleyball section.

While there are drink vending machines, what's lacking are public restrooms.
Great place to work out with family and friends in the morning. Only wish the beach volleyball court is open.
